meanings.sent1: I videoed my cat playing with a toy.
meanings.sent2: She videoed the school play for her parents to watch later.
meanings.sent3: The dog videoed the squirrel with a tiny camera.
meanings.sent4: The security camera videoed the thief in action.
meanings.sent5: He videoed the sunset to share its beauty with friends.

meanings.sent1: They videoed the birthday party to remember the fun.
meanings.sent2: The documentary crew videoed the wildlife in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The alien spaceship videoed the Earthlings from above.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were videoed in the old family tapes.
meanings.sent5: He videoed the dance performance to analyze his moves.
